promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young strong bird normal-type pokemon with shiny feathers. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Feathlet, a a chibi young strong bird normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Facade. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "normal" or "Feathlet". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bird-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: In quaint hamlets, this petite avian dynamo trains daily, perfecting its Facade ability to cheer up villagers with endearing displays of might.
